timeline.message:
CB-8204 remove env list if not necessary

In the old DH list page function was not updated when we introduced the /crn and /name endpoints. Now with this change we will only list environments when required.

timeline.bodyText: I think one info log with the selected subnets would be useful
timeline.author: biharitomi
